name: Dots 1
description: In a world of dormant dots, one dot comes to life and must escape his hellish prison. As your friends wake up you feel a sense of amazement and wonder. But it doesn't last long as you find out everything here is trying to kill you even the other awaken. As your friends quickly try to escape the guardian tries to stop you in your tracks! You will die a very painful death if you are not careful.    Dots 2 - World War Square coming soon
